title: EAGLE EYES – RISE WITH SPIRITUAL CLARITY

memory_verse.label: Memory Verse
memory_verse.text: “They that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles.” – Isaiah 40:31

devotion.label: Insight / Reflection
devotion.text:
The eagle is known for its powerful wings and extraordinary eyesight. It can spot even the smallest creature from a great distance. The Bible uses the eagle to symbolize spiritual strength, renewed energy, and divine vision especially for those who wait on God.

We, too, have two wings in our spiritual life:
Bible Reading and Prayer Life. When these two wings are strong and balanced, our spiritual flight becomes steady and victorious.

When an eagle flies high, its vision becomes clear. Likewise, when we pray and read God’s Word with reverence, our perspective changes. Problems look smaller, decisions become clearer, and temptations lose their power. Spiritual altitude brings spiritual clarity.
Let us strengthen both wings. Let us fly above the noise of the world. Let us rise like the eagle!

quote.label: Today's Quote
quote.text: A.W. Tozer: “When we lift our hearts to God, we rise above the shadows of this world.”

prayer.label: Prayer
prayer.text: Lord, strengthen my wings my prayer life and my Bible meditation. Lift me above confusion and give me eagle-eye clarity. Help me soar in Your strength. Amen.

conclusion.label: A Word to You
text: May God lift you to higher spiritual altitudes.
May your eyes see clearly the path God has prepared for you.

recommended_book.label: Recommended Book
recommended_book.title: “Secrets of the Secret Place”
recommended_book.author: Bob Sorge
recommended_book.quote: "A powerful reminder about maintaining balance between prayer and the Word".
